extensionDescription.message: Copy 2FA codes from Android Messages so you can stop switching tabs

notificationTitle.description: Title of notification to inform that user that the 2FA code was copied to the clipboard

welcomeTitle.message: Welcome to Copy 2FA to Android Messages

welcomeDescription.message: This extension requires permission to access your data on Android Messages.
welcomeDescription.description: Explanation of why the welcome page popped up

welcomeActionButton.description: Text to display on the button that will trigger the grant permission workflow
